transform_def.name: tile_OneWay
transform_def.string:
let r0 = 1.0 / sqrt(abs(unit_rnd_0 - unit_rnd_1)) r = if(isFinite(r0), r0, big())
var = cos(if(p_in.x > 0.0, p_in.x - floor(p_in.x), p_in.x + floor(p_in.x)) * pi()) pf = if(var < unit_rnd_3 * 2.0 - 1.0, if(p_in.x > -1.0, 0.0, -1.0), 0.0) f = floor(log(unit_rnd_2) * if(p_in.x > -1.0, -r, 0.0)) * 2.0 x = p_in.x + pf + f in vec2(x, p_in.y) * weight
